name: iOS iMessage Stickers Template
description:
This is my starter template for designing Stickers for iOS iMessage + the App Icon for the app.


I have also created an Template for coding the iOS app for the stickers. You can find it on my Github page through the link below.

https://github.com/NiklasPeterson/ios-message-stickers-template


Apple links for learning more about iMessage Stickers

https://developer.apple.com/imessage/

https://developer.apple.com/documentation/messages
